mapper.select: SELECT L.BOOK_NO , L.TITLE , L.AUTHOR , L.COMPANY , M.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME , B.BORROW_DATE , B.DUE_DATE , O.OVERDUE_CNT , O.STATUS_NOW , O.RESTRICTION FROM BOOK_OVERDUE O JOIN BORROW B ON B.BORROW_NO = O.BORROW_NO JOIN BOOK_LIST L ON L.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = O.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY O.OVERDUE_NO DESC
